title: Can we genetically modify humans the same way we modify plants, making humans stronger, resistant to diseases, etc? - Quora

response.answer_text: Certainly, or rather our children or grandchildren will. There are a lot of technical problems that need to be solved before you can order the next generation from a catalog. But this is stuff just on the future side of the cutting edge. No impossible barriers stand in our way.
The future holds many possibilities my friend. With that being said, this “modification” will create other problems in regards to this also. Life will ALWAYS balance itself out.
